Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Authorizes the county of Onondaga to impose a tax on real estate transfers
Summary: Authorizes the county of Onondaga to impose a tax of three dollars per thousand dollars on real estate transfers.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to authorizing the county of Onondaga to impose a tax on real estate transfers; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
